author: Sharon Terlep
title: Newell Adds New Directors Ahead of Proxy Fight With Starboard
text:
BOCA RATON, Fla.—Newell Brands Inc., a conglomerate that makes everything from Elmer’s glue to Mr. Coffee machines, is adding three new board members ahead of a proxy fight with an activist investor seeking to oust the entire board and chief executive.

The announcement Thursday comes as Newell grapples with a dramatic sales slowdown. The company was forced to lower forecasts several times in 2017 and its shares are about 40% lower than a year ago, giving it market value of about $14 billion.
